CustomField.description: This is the system agnostic unique Id for each customer/partner and will be used to identify the Account uniquely by the business, Sales Ops, Finance etc
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Universal Account ID - It is system agnostic Id and will be used to identify the customer by Sales Ops, Deal Hub, Finance etc. in Salesforce, NetSuite and other systems
CustomField.label: Unique Account ID
